pkgmetadata.longdescription: The package contains BioGRID interactions for various organisms in a simple format // The package contains BioGRID interactions for arabidopsis(thale cress), c.elegans, fruit fly, human, mouse, yeast( budding yeast ) and S.pombe (fission yeast) . Entrez ids, official names and unique ids can be used to find proteins. The format of interactions are lists. For each gene/protein, there is an entry in the list with "name" containing name of the gene/protein and "interactors" containing the list of genes/proteins interacting with it.
